languages.text: "Просьба прибыть лично во Дворец Правосудия. Префект сообщает о страшной ереси, угрожающей протекторату фон Валанциус. В ваше отсутствие были приняты меры по предотвращению распространения скверны, однако ваше присутствие необходимо для финального решения. Префект Вультур лично встретит вас для приватного разговора".

"You are requested to come to the Palace of Justice in person. The prefect speaks of a terrible heresy that is threatening the von Valancius protectorate. While you were away, steps were taken to prevent the spread of the corruption; however, your presence is required to make the final decision. Prefect Vultur will meet you in person for a confidential conversation."
languages.original_text: "Просьба прибыть лично во Дворец Правосудия. Префект сообщает о страшной ереси, угрожающей протекторату фон Валанциус. В ваше отсутствие были приняты меры по предотвращению распространения скверны, однако ваше присутствие необходимо для финального решения. Префект Вультур лично встретит вас для приватного разговора".

languages.text: "Ihr sollt persönlich zum Justizpalast kommen. Die Präfektin spricht von einer furchtbaren Ketzerei, die das Protektorat von Valancius bedroht. In Eurer Abwesenheit wurden Schritte unternommen, um die Ausbreitung der Verderbnis zu verhindern. Dennoch ist Eure Anwesenheit vonnöten, um eine endgültige Entscheidung zu treffen. Präfektin Vultur erwartet Euch zu einem vertraulichen Gespräch."
languages.original_text: "You are requested to come to the Palace of Justice in person. The prefect speaks of a terrible heresy that is threatening the von Valancius protectorate. While you were away, steps were taken to prevent the spread of the corruption; however, your presence is required to make the final decision. Prefect Vultur will meet you in person for a confidential conversation."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr sollt persönlich zum Justizpalast kommen. Die Präfektin spricht von einer furchtbaren Ketzerei, die das Protektorat von Valancius bedroht. In Eurer Abwesenheit wurden Schritte unternommen, um die Ausbreitung der Verderbnis zu verhindern. Dennoch ist Eure Anwesenheit vonnöten, um eine endgültige Entscheidung zu treffen. Präfektin Vultur erwartet Euch zu einem vertraulichen Gespräch."

languages.text: « Vous devez vous rendre en personne au palais de justice. Selon la préfète, une terrible hérésie menace le protectorat von Valancius. En votre absence, des mesures ont été prises pour endiguer la corruption. Toutefois, votre présence est requise pour prendre la décision finale. La préfète Vultur s'entretiendra avec vous en privé sur place. »
languages.original_text: "You are requested to come to the Palace of Justice in person. The prefect speaks of a terrible heresy that is threatening the von Valancius protectorate. While you were away, steps were taken to prevent the spread of the corruption; however, your presence is required to make the final decision. Prefect Vultur will meet you in person for a confidential conversation."

traits.locale_text: « Vous devez vous rendre en personne au palais de justice. Selon la préfète, une terrible hérésie menace le protectorat von Valancius. En votre absence, des mesures ont été prises pour endiguer la corruption. Toutefois, votre présence est requise pour prendre la décision finale. La préfète Vultur s'entretiendra avec vous en privé sur place. »

languages.text: “他们希望您能亲自前往正义大殿。那位行政官说，某种可怕的异端恶行正在威胁整个冯·瓦兰修斯王朝。您不在的这段时间，他们采取了措施，阻止腐化蔓延。不过，您需要亲自出席，做出最后的决定。沃尔图尔行政官也会亲自与您会面，进行一场秘密谈话。”
languages.original_text: "You are requested to come to the Palace of Justice in person. The prefect speaks of a terrible heresy that is threatening the von Valancius protectorate. While you were away, steps were taken to prevent the spread of the corruption; however, your presence is required to make the final decision. Prefect Vultur will meet you in person for a confidential conversation."

traits.locale_text: “他们希望您能亲自前往正义大殿。那位行政官说，某种可怕的异端恶行正在威胁整个冯·瓦兰修斯王朝。您不在的这段时间，他们采取了措施，阻止腐化蔓延。不过，您需要亲自出席，做出最后的决定。沃尔图尔行政官也会亲自与您会面，进行一场秘密谈话。”

languages.text: «Se solicita su presencia en el Palacio de la Justicia. La prefecta habla de una terrible herejía que amenaza al protectorado von Valancius. Mientras no estaba, se tomaron medidas para evitar la propagación de la corrupción; no obstante, se necesita su palabra para tomar una decisión definitiva. La prefecta Vultur se reunirá con usted en persona para hablarlo en privado».
languages.original_text: "You are requested to come to the Palace of Justice in person. The prefect speaks of a terrible heresy that is threatening the von Valancius protectorate. While you were away, steps were taken to prevent the spread of the corruption; however, your presence is required to make the final decision. Prefect Vultur will meet you in person for a confidential conversation."

traits.locale_text: «Se solicita su presencia en el Palacio de la Justicia. La prefecta habla de una terrible herejía que amenaza al protectorado von Valancius. Mientras no estaba, se tomaron medidas para evitar la propagación de la corrupción; no obstante, se necesita su palabra para tomar una decisión definitiva. La prefecta Vultur se reunirá con usted en persona para hablarlo en privado».

languages.text: 「直接、司法宮にお越しいただくよう、要請があります。総監は、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の保護領を脅かす恐るべき異端について言及しています。あなたが不在の間に、腐敗の拡大を防ぐための措置が取られましたが、最終決定を下すためにはあなたの出席が必要です。ヴァルター総監が個別に秘密の会談のためにお会いします」
languages.original_text: "You are requested to come to the Palace of Justice in person. The prefect speaks of a terrible heresy that is threatening the von Valancius protectorate. While you were away, steps were taken to prevent the spread of the corruption; however, your presence is required to make the final decision. Prefect Vultur will meet you in person for a confidential conversation."

traits.locale_text: 「直接、司法宮にお越しいただくよう、要請があります。総監は、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の保護領を脅かす恐るべき異端について言及しています。あなたが不在の間に、腐敗の拡大を防ぐための措置が取られましたが、最終決定を下すためにはあなたの出席が必要です。ヴァルター総監が個別に秘密の会談のためにお会いします」

languages.text: "Adalet Sarayı'na bizzat gelmeniz talep ediliyor. Prefekt, von Valancius protektorasını tehdit eden korkunç bir kâfirlikten söz ediyor. Siz yokken yozlaşmanın yayılmasını önlemek adına bazı adımlar atılmış ancak nihai kararın verilmesi için orada bulunmanız şart. Prefekt Vultur, sizinle gizli bir görüşme gerçekleştirecek."
languages.original_text: "You are requested to come to the Palace of Justice in person. The prefect speaks of a terrible heresy that is threatening the von Valancius protectorate. While you were away, steps were taken to prevent the spread of the corruption; however, your presence is required to make the final decision. Prefect Vultur will meet you in person for a confidential conversation."

traits.locale_text: "Adalet Sarayı'na bizzat gelmeniz talep ediliyor. Prefekt, von Valancius protektorasını tehdit eden korkunç bir sapkınlıktan söz ediyor. Siz yokken yozlaşmanın yayılmasını önlemek adına bazı adımlar atılmış ancak nihai kararın verilmesi için orada bulunmanız şart. Prefekt Vultur, sizinle gizli bir görüşme gerçekleştirecek."
